title: How to Build a Trellis | Gorgeous Climbing Plants

tasks.task: Building a garden trellis for climbing roses
subtasks: Designing the trellis around the existing stucco wall
Pouring concrete footings for structural stability
Assembling vertical posts and horizontal beams with redwood material
Attaching metal mesh lattice using an inner wood frame and metal clips
Adding decorative caps to enhance appearance
Setting up concrete footings with proper depth and reinforcement
Cutting and staining redwood lumber for vertical posts and horizontal beams
Drilling dowels and applying glue for beam-to-post connections
Laying out metal mesh lattice and attaching with appropriate hardware
Mitering corners for the inner wood frame and securing with deck screws

tasks.task: Installing climbing roses and utilizing the trellis structure
subtasks: Training roses to grow on the lattice for support and aesthetics
Watering and maintaining the climbing roses
Sharing harvested roses for personal use and community events
